Package com.compendium.ui.menus

Interface Summary
IUIMenu This class is the interface of all Compendium menu classes
 

Class Summary
UIMenuEdit This class creates and manages the Edit menu.
UIMenuFavorites This class creates and manages the Favorites menu.
UIMenuFile This class creates the file menu.
UIMenuHelp This class creates and manages the Help menu.
UIMenuManager This class creates and managers the main frame's menu.
UIMenuTools This class creates and manages the Tools menu.
UIMenuView This class creates and manages the View menu.
UIMenuWindows This class creates and manages the Window menu.
UIMenuWorkspaces This class creates and manages the Workspaces menu.
